title: Meatloaf roulade
ingredients: ['300g washed spinach leaves', '450g beef mince', '450g pork mince', '3 large eggs, lightly beaten', '150g breadcrumbs', '125g grated Pecorino Romano or Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 slices provolone or Gruyere cheese', '6 slices prosciutto or ham', '3 tablespoons plain flour, for dusting', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '500ml red wine', '500ml water']
